H0.text: Which British Prime Minister married Clementine Hozier on September 12th 1908. Winston Churchill

H1.text: Which British Prime Minister married Clementine Hozier on September 12th 1908. Neville Chamberlain

H2.text: Which British Prime Minister married Clementine Hozier on September 12th 1908. David Lloyd George

H3.text: Which British Prime Minister married Clementine Hozier on September 12th 1908. The Focus

A4.text: Churchill proposed marriage to Clementine Hozier; they were married on 12 September 1908 at St Margaret's, Westminster
